data.text: @C_Ups17 @MDinCanada Everything is about positive tests and not about being sick from Covid
@C_Ups17 @MDinCanada Of course not. That would be giving us too much information!

@GetHerHome @MDinCanada Yeah, that's my guess too. 

No, the for and with are not broken down by age AFAIK.

@C_Ups17 My suspicion would be that neonatal ICU admission rate always exceeds pediatric ICU rates, and that much is driven by premature births and congenital abnormalities. Ideally need pre-covid stats to confirm
@C_Ups17 Under 20 the risk is 0.4%. it's the same risk as the flu. https://t.co/aSlVSawZ4v

Data from PHO's very interesting report on severe outcomes during the Omicron wave.
